DOC.brief_summary: In an era of delayed fertility plans, there is increasing need for fertility treatment in older women with poor response. Human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) supplementation prior to treatment, as a thecal stimulant, may improve folliculogenesis and ovarian response.
DOC.brief_title: Human Chorionic Gonadotropin Supplementation Prior to In-vitro Fertilization Treatment in Poor Responders
DOC.criteria: women >39 years on IVF treatment polycystic ovary syndrome Any allergy to injection of human chorionic gonadotropin before
